Sentencas: A fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid propulsion concept is introduced and initially assessed.
Titulo: Initial Assessment of a Fuel Cell-Gas Turbine Hybrid Propulsion Concept

Sentencas: The concept uses the water mass flow produced by a hydrogen fuel cell in order to improve the efficiency and power output of the gas turbine engine through burner steam injection.
Titulo: Initial Assessment of a Fuel Cell-Gas Turbine Hybrid Propulsion Concept

Sentencas: Therefore, the fuel cell product water is conditioned through a process of condensation, pressurization and re-vaporization.
Titulo: Initial Assessment of a Fuel Cell-Gas Turbine Hybrid Propulsion Concept

Sentencas: The vaporization uses the waste heat of the gas turbine exhaust.
Titulo: Initial Assessment of a Fuel Cell-Gas Turbine Hybrid Propulsion Concept

Sentencas: The functional principles of the system concept are introduced and discussed, and appropriate methodology for an initial concept evaluation is formulated.
Titulo: Initial Assessment of a Fuel Cell-Gas Turbine Hybrid Propulsion Concept

Sentencas: Essential technology fields are surveyed in brief.
Titulo: Initial Assessment of a Fuel Cell-Gas Turbine Hybrid Propulsion Concept

Sentencas: The impact of burner steam injection on gas turbine efficiency and sizing is parametrically modelled.
Titulo: Initial Assessment of a Fuel Cell-Gas Turbine Hybrid Propulsion Concept

Sentencas: Simplified parametric models of the fuel cell system and key components of the water treatment process are presented.
Titulo: Initial Assessment of a Fuel Cell-Gas Turbine Hybrid Propulsion Concept

Sentencas: Fuel cell stack efficiency and specific power levels are methodically derived from latest experimental studies at the laboratory scale.
Titulo: Initial Assessment of a Fuel Cell-Gas Turbine Hybrid Propulsion Concept

Sentencas: The overall concept is assessed for a liquid hydrogen fueled short-/medium range aircraft application.
Titulo: Initial Assessment of a Fuel Cell-Gas Turbine Hybrid Propulsion Concept

Sentencas: Block fuel savings of up to 7.1% are found for an optimum design case based on solid oxide fuel cell technology.
Titulo: Initial Assessment of a Fuel Cell-Gas Turbine Hybrid Propulsion Concept

Sentencas: The optimum design features a gas turbine water-to-air ratio of 6.1% in cruise and 62% reduced high-level NOx emissions.
Titulo: Initial Assessment of a Fuel Cell-Gas Turbine Hybrid Propulsion Concept
